articles.description: It marks the first time the rapper has licensed his music to a political candidate
articles.content:
Eminem has officially endorsed Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden by approving the use of his signature hit, "Lose Yourself", in a new campaign ad.

articles.description: Apart from Nishant Singh Malkani and Kavita Kaushik, the other contestants nominated for eviction were Jasmin Bhasin and Rubina Dilaik.

articles.title: Top 'Jeopardy!' winners Ken Jennings, James Holzhauer, Brad Rutter try to stop contestants in new ABC quiz show 'The Chase' - USA TODAY
articles.description: "Jeopardy!" legends Ken Jennings, James Holzhauer and Brad Rutter are part of a new quiz show coming to ABC: "The Chase."
articles.content:
Sony says Jennings will present his own special video categories, develop projects, and serve as a general ambassador for the show.
